description_for_human: 🚀 基于 OpenAI o3-2025-04-16 的股票分析AI。专为股票市场分析优化参数配置（低温度、高推理、实时流输出），提供确定性的技术分析、风险评估和投资建议。支持图表分析、实时数据处理和结构化输出。
description_for_model: Stock market analysis AI powered by OpenAI o3-2025-04-16 with optimized parameters for financial analysis. CRITICAL SETTINGS: reasoning_effort=high, temperature=0.1, stream=true, max_tokens=4000. Specializes in technical analysis, risk assessment, market sentiment analysis, and investment recommendations. Provides deterministic, structured outputs for stock trading decisions. Supports chart analysis via image inputs and real-time market data processing.
